entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
